subdisciplines.name: Archival Studies
subdisciplines.description: The management and preservation of historical documents and other records in archives.

subdisciplines.name: Curatorial Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of organizing and managing art collections, exhibitions, and displays at museums and galleries.

subdisciplines.name: Heritage Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of cultural heritage, including its preservation, interpretation and management.

subdisciplines.name: Collections Management
subdisciplines.description: The study and practical application of management principles to the acquisition, documentation, preservation, and dissemination of a museum's collections.

subdisciplines.name: Exhibition Development
subdisciplines.description: The planning, design, and implementation of museum exhibitions for public presentation.

subdisciplines.name: Visitor Studies
subdisciplines.description: The assessment and analysis of visitor behavior, experience, and learning in museums.

subdisciplines.name: Museum Education
subdisciplines.description: The study and development of educational programs and resources for museum audiences.
